title: Foreign secretary extends Eid greetings to security personnel
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 14 (APP):Foreign Secretary Sohail Mahmood Friday extended Eid greetings to the Islamabad Police and other security personnel performing their duties at the foreign ministry.
The foreign secretary thanked the security personnel for their services.
Sohail Mahmood also had a group photo with the security personnel who were also served with sweets.
